inclusion.criterion: managed at the sleep unit at Reims University Hospital for the diagnosis of sleep apnea syndrome by nocturnal airway polygraphy or polysomnography
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: accepting participation in the study (signed non-opposition form)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: refusing to be included in the study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: not speaking French or not able to read (inability to complete the questionnaires specific to the study)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has abdominal pain and vomiting, with a history of alcohol consumption and smoking. He is healthy with no allergies or medication use.
